title: [OFF-TOPIC]How do I change my argumentative personality?
body:
I don't experience it as much irl, but on the internet. I love to argue and disagree with every single thing.

New Yas skin? Thread about how it's bad. "It's just your opinion stfu". Youtube comment on how he likes it, "Stfu look at that garbage, look at likes/dislikes, look at community". New champ is bad desing, "no", new champ is good design, "no".

What do I do to change myself? I will always make my own opinion, but argue against ppl that have similar ones... Should spend less then 6 six hours a day on internet I guess...
